AIT TechCamp 資訊傳播科技暨應用培訓營

活動日期: 2019年8月27-29日 (2天半)

活動地點: Taipei, Taiwan  

活動報名截止日期為2019年六月十日23:00

報名表在這裡：https://www.ait.org.tw/wp-content/uploads/sites/269/AIT-TechCamp-AppForm.pdf

本活動以英文進行，我們將邀請美國與區域內的講師專家，就此一主題為台灣與印太地區的學員提供一次嶄新的培訓體驗。

**Fee:** AIT will cover all expenses incurred during the TechCamp, including meals, educational materials, and other miscellaneous fees.  Lodging, transportation, and insurance will be covered for participants travelling from outside the Taipei metropolitan area.

**Language:** Participants should have strong English skills as all activities will be conducted in English.

**Criteria for Selection:**
1. Emerging journalists, journalism students, social media influencers (including YouTubers and bloggers), members of the tech and programing community, and members of related NGOs are eligible to apply.
1. English proficiency is required. Participants must be able to discuss complex issues in English.
1. Completed application forms must be submitted no later than June 10, 2019, including a paragraph explaining the candidates’ interest and suitability for the program.
1. Interested participants may also seek a recommendation from professors, supervisors, AIT alumni or related NGOs.

(ＡＩＴ的活動只剩下5天可以報名！！大家把握機會唷＝Ｄ)
